meanings.sent1: The toplofty cat refused to play with the other animals.
meanings.sent2: She always acted toplofty towards her classmates, thinking she was better than them.
meanings.sent3: The toplofty squirrel refused to share his nuts with the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her toplofty attitude made her isolated from her peers.
meanings.sent5: The toplofty queen looked down on everyone in the kingdom.

meanings.definition: A person who is arrogant or haughty.
meanings.sent1: The toplofty in the office never bothered to greet his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the toplofty of the group, always acting superior.
meanings.sent3: The toplofty at the party refused to dance with anyone.
meanings.sent4: He strutted around like a toplofty peacock, showing off his feathers.
meanings.sent5: The toplofty strut of the peacock caught everyone's attention.
